page.title: 13John Wilkinson School News
page.content: June 11th,Children went to Madeley to compete in the area{swimming gala}.14 schools took part.The John Wilkinson school finished 2nd over all.7 children have been chosen to swim for Telford in the Shropshire school swimming championships in Shrewsbury on July 12th. June 21st, A {music festival}was held at Wenlock Comprehensive School.5 Primary Schools took part.We sang songs and played musical instruments. Later we made up some music about the Giant of the Wrekin.At the end we showed the other schools our morris dancing. July 2nd, Some children went to the William Brookes School to take part in {running, jumping}and{throwing}events.
